name: get_all_characters
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool riordanverse_api.
Tool description: An API for RiordanVerse
API description: Fetches and returns a list of characters from the Riordanverse API with optional query parameters for limiting the results, skipping a number of characters, or searching for characters containing a specific substring.

limit.description: The maximum number of characters to return. Defaults to None.

search.description: A substring to search within character names. Defaults to None.

skip.description: The number of characters to skip from the start. Defaults to None.
